SEARCH:
Package game

Klasse Trick

java.lang.Object
game.Trick
public class Trick extends Object
Represents a trick in a round of the game, containing 0-4 cards

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    Trick(int starter)
    Initializes a new trick with the specified starting player.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Trick

      public Trick(int starter) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Initializes a new trick with the specified starting player.
      Parameter:
      starter - The player who starts the trick. Should be in the range {0, 1, 2, 3}.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the player number is invalid.

  • Methodendetails

    • addCard

      public void addCard(Card card, int playerNo) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a card to the trick played by a specific player.
      Parameter:
      card - The card to be added to the trick.
      playerNo - The player who played the card. Should be in the range {0, 1, 2, 3}.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the card is null or the player number is invalid.

    • getStartingCard

      public int getStartingCard()
      Gets the identifier of the starting card in the trick.
      Gibt zurück:
      The identifier of the starting card if a card has been played; otherwise, -1.

    • getHighCard

      public Card getHighCard()
      Gets the card that currently wins the trick.
      Gibt zurück:
      The card that currently wins the trick, or null if no cards have been played.

    • getWinner

      public int getWinner()
      Gets the player number who currently wins the trick.
      Gibt zurück:
      The player number who currently wins the trick, or -1 if no cards have been played yet.

    • countPoints

      public int countPoints()
      Counts the points of the trick based on the cards played so far.
      Gibt zurück:
      The total points of the trick.

    • getCardPlayedByPlayer

      public Card getCardPlayedByPlayer(int playerNo)
      Gets the card played by a specific player in the trick.
      Parameter:
      playerNo - The player whose card is to be retrieved.
      Gibt zurück:
      The card played by the specified player.

    • getNumPlayedCards

      public int getNumPlayedCards()
      Gets the number of cards played in the trick.
      Gibt zurück:
      The number of cards played in the trick.

    • getStarter

      public int getStarter()
      Gets the starting player of the trick.
      Gibt zurück:
      The player number who started the trick.

    • getCardsPlayedCopy

      public Card[] getCardsPlayedCopy()
      Gets a copy of the cards played in the trick.
      Gibt zurück:
      An array containing copies of the cards played in the trick.

    • getCardsPlayed

      public Card[] getCardsPlayed()
      Gets the cards played in the trick.
      Gibt zurück:
      An array containing the cards played in the trick.
